text: Laura Syril Friedman (born December 3, 1966) is an American politician and former movie producer who is the member of the U.S. House of Representatives for California's 30th congressional district since 2025. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Before, Friedman was a member of the California State Assembly since 2016. Friedman was a member of the Glendale City Council from 2009 to 2016. She was also Mayor of Glendale from 2011 to 2012. Friedman also helped write the pro-housing bill to stop minimum parking requirements for housing mass transit stations. She is a progressive. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Laura Friedman at ballotpedia.org * Join California Laura Friedman Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Movie producers from Florida Category:United States representatives from California Category:Politicians from Glendale, California Category:Writers from Los Angeles County, California Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles County, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:American mayors Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish American writers Category:American progressives Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Laura Friedman
